title: Stock Market, Finance & Stock Exchange Business News – Ahmedabad Mirror
text:
Forever 21 files for bankruptcy, to close 178 stores in United States Fast-fashion retailer Forever 21 filed for bankruptcy late on Sunday, joining a growing list of brick-and-mortar companies that have succumbed to the onslaught of online sellers such as Amazon.com and ever-changing fashion trends.

Sensex zooms 1,921 points on FM Nirmala Sitharaman's tax booster; auto, bank stocks soar The finance minister also said the government will not levy the enhanced surcharge introduced in the Budget on capital gains arising on sale of equity shares in a companies liable for securities transaction tax.

Sensex jumps by over 1,200 points after Nirmala Sitharaman announces slash in corporate tax Equity indices jumped on Friday morning after Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman announced slashing of corporate tax for local and domestic manufacturing companies.

Cigarette stocks spurt as government stubs out e-cigarettes New Delhi, Sep 18 () Cigarette stocks gained up to 5.5 per cent on Wednesday after the Cabinet approved an ordinance for banning production, import, distribution and sale of electronic cigarettes.

Sensex drops 262 points as crude oil prices boil Tracking oil prices movement, the Indian rupee saw heavy depreciation in value against the US dollar, spooking investors here, experts said.
